text: Tamara "Tammy" Faye Messner (March 7, 1942 - July 20, 2007) was an American Christian singer, evangelist, entrepreneur, author, talk show host, and television personality. She was born in International Falls, Minnesota. Messner was a contestant in the second season of The Surreal Life. Messner died of colon cancer in Loch Lloyd, Missouri at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American television talk show hosts Category:Cancer deaths in Missouri Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Singers from Minnesota Category:The Surreal Life participants
title: Tammy Faye Messner
